mapper.select: SELECT D.*,PROFILE.NICKNAME FROM (SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT A.* FROM BOARD A WHERE CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY BNO DESC)B)C WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start_row} AND #{end_row})D INNER JOIN PROFILE ON D.email = PROFILE.email

SELECT D.*,PROFILE.NICKNAME FROM (SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT A.* FROM BOARD A WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' ORDER BY BNO DESC)B)C WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start_row} AND #{end_row})D INNER JOIN PROFILE ON D.email = PROFILE.email

SELECT D.*,PROFILE.NICKNAME FROM (SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT A.* FROM BOARD A WHERE EMAIL = #{searchText} ORDER BY BNO DESC)B)C WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start_row} AND #{end_row})D INNER JOIN PROFILE ON D.email = PROFILE.email
SELECT A.*,PROFILE.NICKNAME FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno})A INNER JOIN PROFILE ON A.EMAIL = PROFILE.EMAIL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY = #{category}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE EMAIL = #{searchText}

SELECT C.*,PROFILE.NICKNAME, PROFILE.PICTUREPATH FROM (SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE WRITEDATE BETWEEN to_char(CURRENT_DATE-#{term}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY RECOMMEND DESC)A)B WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND #{endNum})C INNER JOIN PROFILE ON C.email = PROFILE.email

SELECT B.*,PROFILE.NICKNAME, PROFILE.PICTUREPATH FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY WRITEDATE DESC)A) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5)B INNER JOIN PROFILE ON B.email = PROFILE.email
SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM PROFILE ORDER BY FOLLOWER DESC)A) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5
mapper.delete: DELETE BOARDCOMMENT WHERE CNO = #{cno} AND EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDCOMMENT SET CONTENT = #{comment} WHERE CNO = #{cno}
